segments.text: Do you take in students ? I've been told you might have a vacant room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.If you don't mind sharing room with someone else , there's one available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have a look at it , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , but I'm on my way out now.Could you come back in an hour ?
segments.speaker: S2
